title: Active Recovery
description: This is one way to spend your “rest” day. So instead of lounging on the couch all day you’ll schedule some sort of low-intensity activity like light walking or gentle yoga.

title: Aerobic Exercise
description: Often we call all cardio ‘aerobics,’ but aerobic is actually a specific energy system, explains Lefkowith. [Energy systems] relate to how your body produces energy to fuel your workouts.

title: Anaerobic Exercise
description: On the other hand, your anaerobic energy system is taxed when you do high-intensity workouts that skyrocket your heart rate. “Anaerobic activities are short intervals of work used to improve speed and power,” explains Lefkowith.

title: Boot Camp
description: On the other hand, your anaerobic energy system is taxed when you do high-intensity workouts that skyrocket your heart rate. “Anaerobic activities are short intervals of work used to improve speed and power,” explains Lefkowith.
